sourcesContent:
import '../styles/Result.css' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { attempts_Number, earnPoints_Number, flagResult } from '../helper/helper' //import actions import { resetAllAction } from '../redux/question_reducer' import { resetResultAction } from '../redux/result_reducer' import { usePublishResult } from '../hooks/setResult' export default function Result(){ const dispatch = useDispatch() const { questions : {queue, answers}, result : { result, userId}} = useSelector(state => state) const totalPoints = queue.length * 10; const attempts = attempts_Number(result); const earnPoints = earnPoints_Number(result, answers, 10) const flag = flagResult(totalPoints, earnPoints) //store user result usePublishResult({ result, username : userId, attempts, points : earnPoints, achieved : flag ? "Passed" : "Failed"}) function onRestart(){ dispatch(resetAllAction()) dispatch(resetResultAction()) } return(

Results

Username {userId}
Total Marks {totalPoints || 0}
Earned Marks {earnPoints || 0}
Result {flag ? "Passed" : "Failed"}
Back to Start
) }
